text: aur jo tumamen se mar jaayen tatha patniyaan chhod jaayen, ve apanee patniyon ke lie ek varsh tak, unahen kharch dene tatha (ghar se) na nikaalane kee vasiyyat kar jaayen, yadi ve svayan nikal jaayen[1] tatha saamaany niyamaanusaar apane vishay mein kuchh bhee karen, to tumapar koee dosh nahin. allaah prabhaavashaalee tatvagy hai
